text: Kotdwar District is a newly proposed district in the state of Uttarakhand, India. Its district head quarter at town Kotdwar It is divided part of district Pauri Garhwal district. Area of Kotdwar district is 1426 sq km and population is 365,850. ==Tehsils== St. Mary Church, Lansdowne *Lansdowne *Satpuli *Kotdwar *Dhumakot *Yamkeshwar. ==References== Category:Proposed districts of Uttarakhand
title: Kotdwar district
